Company Name, Company Type, and Link are all required fields.

  • "Publication" means a blog (including corporate blogs), magazine, or newsletter that buys articles.
  • "Publisher" means a company that publishes books and pays royalties.
  • "Agency" means a company that finds writers hourly or project work.
If possible, link directly to the company's "write for us" or "guest post" page. Otherwise, link to the publication's main page.
If the editor has a public email address that they invite prospective authors to contact them at, enter it here.
General topics like Front-End Development, Back-End Development, Data Science, Infrastructure, etc.
The rate, in USD, that the company offers first-time writers. This can be a per-article rate, hourly rate, or royalty structure. Ranges are ok!
Any other information you know about the publication.
